snippet.title: Mecha Break - Official Reveal Trailer | Game Awards 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the Mecha BREAK announcement trailer for the upcoming multiplayer mech sci-fi combat game developed by Seasun Games. Choose from a variety of different mechs and exclusive pilots as you take on colossal war machines across dangerous battlefields. Engage in 3v3, 6v6, or Battle Royale modes, and try out each mech’s distinctive weapons as a brawler, sniper, defender, support, or attacker. Team up with your squad to secure victory, and customize your mech’s appearance to look good while doing so.

#ign #gaming #thegameawards #mechabreak
